import React from "react" import { deleteDeck } from "../utils/api/index.js" import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom" function DeckView ({ deck }) { const history = useHistory(); function deleteHandler() { deleteDeck(deck.id) console.log("sheesh") window.location.reload(); } return (
{deck.name}

{deck.description}

View Study
) } export default DeckView
